name: elimhOLD
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4
body: -| wi(wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w2), wb(w1, w0))
-| wi(wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w3), wb(w4, w0))

stmt.origin: syl(w1, wb(w1, w0), wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w1, wb(w1, w0))
-| wi(w1, wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w2))
-| wi(wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w2), wb(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| wi(wn(w1), w0)
-| wi(w1, wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w2))
-| wi(wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w2), wb(w1, w0))

|- w0
-| wi(wn(w1), w0)
-| wi(wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w2), wb(w1, w0))

stmt.origin: syl(wn(w1), wb(w4, w0), wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(w1), wb(w4, w0))
-| wi(wn(w1), wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w3))
-| wi(wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w3), wb(w4, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- w0
-| wi(wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w2), wb(w1, w0))
-| w4
-| wi(wn(w1), wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w3))
-| wi(wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w3), wb(w4, w0))

|- w0
-| wi(wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w2), wb(w1, w0))
-| w4
-| wi(wb(wif(w1, w2, w3), w3), wb(w4, w0))

comment: Obsolete version of ~ elimh as of 27-Apr-2023. Hypothesis builder for the weak deduction theorem. For more information, see the Weak Deduction Theorem page ~ mmdeduction.html . (Contributed by NM, 26-Jun-2002.) Revised to use the conditional operator. (Revised by BJ, 30-Sep-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
